subject: JUnit 4.12 is released!
msgSnippet: All, I am very happy to announce the release of JUnit 4.12. From today s date (2014-12-04 or in German notation 4.12.) it almost looks like we have been
messageBody:
All,


I am very happy to announce the release of JUnit 4.12. From today's date (2014-12-04 or in German notation 4.12.) it almost looks like we have been waiting for this exact day to ship it... ;-)


There have been a lot of contributions by a full cast of contributors. Thanks again to everyone who took part by reporting an issue, offering his/her opinion, or even submitting a pull request!


Please have a look at our detailed release notes:

https://github.com/junit-team/junit/blob/master/doc/ReleaseNotes4.12.md


You can download the JARs directly from GitHub:

https://github.com/junit-team/junit/releases/tag/r4.12


In addition, the artifacts have been submitted to Maven Central and should appear there within one or two hours. For the very impatient, they are already available in Sonatype's release repository:

https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/releases/


Cheers,


Marc Philipp
